==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|よ|げん|しゃ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|預言|tr1=yogen|t1=prophecy|者|tr2=sha|t2=person|lang=ja|sort=よげんしゃ}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|よげんしゃ}}

# [[prophet]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|予言者|よげんしゃ}}: a [[foreteller]]

====Usage notes====
In speech, this word is identical to {{l|ja|予言者}}. In writing, {{l|ja|預言者}} implies the involvement of gods or spirits, whereas {{l|ja|予言者}} is more neutral about the kind of prediction.
